name: personal-blog
description: Full-stack personal blog with admin panel

scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend && npm run install-admin
scripts.build-only: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-admin
scripts.build: npm run install-all && npm run build-only && echo 'Build completed successfully'
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build verification:' && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); console.log('Frontend build exists:', fs.existsSync('./frontend/build')); console.log('Admin build exists:', fs.existsSync('./admin/build')); if(fs.existsSync('./frontend/build')) { console.log('Frontend build files:', fs.readdirSync('./frontend/build')); } if(fs.existsSync('./admin/build')) { console.log('Admin build files:', fs.readdirSync('./admin/build')); }"
